Text: Bandwidth optimizationSeth Spalding here director of research at epoch partners We met via satellite this january when you presented at CE unterberg towbins conference in New York I have since moved from ceut to epoch partners In any case I ran across a company backed by bill tai at redpoint ventures that has some excellent distributed IP technology used to bring SS like functionality to IP networks I thought you or someone at enron might be interested in speaking with them in light of your bandwidth exchange plans The company is called eyefrog and has nothing of depth available on their website If this would be of interest to you please let me know and I would be happy to put you in touch Regards Seth Spalding Seth Spalding Director Equity Research Epoch Partners sent via wireless
